price: Ал эми, Чын Сөздү алып келген адам менен аны тастыктаган адам(дар)..., Дал ошолор гана такыба пенделер.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī jāa bil-ṣid'qi waṣaddaqa bihi ulāika humu al-mutaqūna
